item.title: Cholesky Decomposition
item.description: Cholesky Decomposition (a.k.a. Cholesky factorisation) is a method of decomposing a positive semidefinite matrix into a lower triangular matrix.

item.title: Least Squares
item.description: The least-squares method, a method of solving overdetermined sets of linear equations, was officially discovered and published by Adrien-Marie Legendre in their work “Nouvelles methodes pour la determination des orbites des cometes”, published in 1805.
